creator: Ariston Thermo SpA
descriptionHtml:
Home gets smarter, Life gets simpler with Chaffolink

Wouldn’t it be nice to set the perfect home temperature with a simple tap, whenever and wherever you are?

With Chaffolink you can control your boiler, heat pump or hybrid solution more easily and conveniently via app, achieving superior levels of comfort and serenity within your home. You can even do it with your voice, thanks to voice assistants!

The app will also be your energy consultant, allowing you to maximize your savings and contribute to building a sustainable future for everyone.

In case of system failure, you will promptly be notified so that you can immediately ask for support. In addition, by activating Chaffolink Pro, you will receive 24/7 assistance from your Chaffoteaux Technical Assistance Center, which will be able to monitor the product and find a solution for any issue, even remotely!

Chaffolink, ideal comfort with a simple touch!

The app will also be your energy consultant, allowing you to maximize your savings and contribute to building a sustainable future for everyone.

In case of system failure, you will promptly be notified so that you can immediately ask for support. In addition, by activating Chaffolink Pro, you will receive 24/7 assistance from your Chaffoteaux Technical Assistance Center, which will be able to monitor the product and find a solution for any issue, even remotely!

Chaffolink, ideal comfort with a simple touch!
descriptionShort: Home gets smarter, Life gets simpler with Chaffolink

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Zigbee compatibility
- Pressure Card
- Tset and Tset offset management
- Bugfix and optimizations

title: ChaffoLink

creator: Ariston Group
descriptionHtml:
Home gets smarter, Life gets simpler with Chaffolink

Wouldn’t it be nice to set the perfect home temperature with a simple tap, whenever and wherever you are?

With Chaffolink you can control your boiler, heat pump or hybrid solution more easily and conveniently via app, achieving superior levels of comfort and serenity within your home. You can even do it with your voice, thanks to voice assistants!

The app will also be your energy consultant, allowing you to maximize your savings and contribute to building a sustainable future for everyone.

In case of system failure, you will promptly be notified so that you can immediately ask for support. In addition, by activating Chaffolink Pro, you will receive 24/7 assistance from your Chaffoteaux Technical Assistance Center, which will be able to monitor the product and find a solution for any issue, even remotely!
